explanation: To determine whether lfs_ctz_index violates the MISRA rule against direct or indirect recursion you must inspect every function it calls (and their transitive callees) to see if any path leads back to lfs_ctz_index. The static call graph shows lfs_ctz_index directly calls only lfs_popc. Therefore the only additional symbol required is lfs_popc: you need its implementation (and any functions it calls) to verify that it does not call lfs_ctz_index (or call another function that eventually calls lfs_ctz_index), which would create indirect recursion.
